infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture photos of your meals for nutrition tracking.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to help you find nearby gyms and fitness facilities.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app would like to access your health data to sync your workouts and nutrition information.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app would like to read your health data to provide personalized recommendations.
